creditline: Lent by the family of Jessie Taber Duthie and Clifford Choisser Foster
description: leather bag, long fringe at bottom, above fringe is a band of loose stripes made of dyed quillwork, red ground with diamond pattern; above quillwork is a rectangular field, white background with central blue diamond design, plain upper with green and white striped boarder
medium: Beads, native-tanned leather, porcupine quills, rawhide
title: Pipe Bag
